entry.content:
Hello! I am a PhD student in Computer Science at Princeton University. I am advised by Prof. Michael Freedman in the SNS Research Group. My research interests are in storage systems, analytics and distributed systems. Before joining Princeton, I completed a masterâ€™s at University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign under the guidance of Prof. Indranil Gupta. Before that, I worked in the industry building high-impact mobile computing systems.

News

  • Fusion is now available on arxiv 2024!
  • RubbleDB is accepted to ATC 2023! Congrats, Haoyu!
  • PrismDB is accepted to ASPLOS 2023!

Selected Publications

  • Efficient Compactions Between Storage Tiers with PrismDB
    Ashwini Raina, Jianan Lu, Asaf Cidon, Michael J. Freedman
    In proc. 28th ACM International Conference on Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems (ASPLOS), 2023
    [paper]
  • RubbleDB: CPU-Efficient Replication with NVMe-oF Haoyu Li, Sheng Jiang, Chen Chen, Ashwini Raina, Xingyu Zhu, Changxu Luo, Asaf Cidon
    In proc. USENIX Annual Technical Conference (ATC), 2023
    [paper]
  • Popular is Cheaper : Curtailing Memory Costs in Interactive Analytics Engines
    Mainak Ghosh, Ashwini Raina, Le Xu, Xiaoyao Qing, Indranil Gupta, Himanshu Gupta
    In proc. 13th European Conference on Computer Systems (EuroSys), 2018
    [paper]

Patents

14 granted patents. List of patents can be found here
